December 29, 1926.

Staten Island.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr

729410f-b.text:
(1)
Richmond Hill Road, south side, 400 feet west
of Forest Hill Road. This property belonged to Weigel (1898-1907), and to Ludwig Brown (1917). The view is eastward
toward Forest Hill Road.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the homestead and farmland,
at a later date.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The homestead as viewed in a westerly direction
from Forest Hill Road.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr

y

729411f-a.text:
Richmomd Hill Road, south side, 430 yards west of Forest Hill Road. The house was owned by J. T. Decker in 1874 (Seers's map), and by Sylvanus Decker from 1898
to 1917 (Robinson and Bromley maps).
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr
729411f-a.folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
729411f-a.original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road

729413f-a.text:
Richmond Hill Road, east from a point 500 yards west of Forest Hill Road, toward the latter. The first house on the right is on the Sylvanus Decker property; the white house and barn beyond that is that of Ludwig Brown; and the dwelling on the left is another Sylvanus Decker
house (1917 map).
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr
729413f-a.folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
729413f-a.original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road

729414f-a.text:
Richmond Hill Road, south side, about 600 yards west of Forest Hill Road. This house has been in the hands of the
De Puy family since 1874 (187eA1917 maps).
June 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr

729414f-a.original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road

729415f-a.text:
Richmond Hill Road, south side, about 700 yards
west of Forest Hill Road. The house was owned by H. Decker in 1874; Mrs. W. Jones from 1898 to 1907; and Annie Sender in 1917.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
